data.name: PageProperties_ErrorMessages_NotPortalPage
data.value: Cannot set properties for this type of file because it is not a portal page.

data.value: An error has occured while trying to create new page. Please double-check all fields and try again.

data.name: PageRegister_ErrorMessages_PageAlreadyExists
data.value: The page you have tried to register already exists in the portal database.

data.name: PageRegister_HeaderDescription
data.value: Use this screen to register existing pages that are created outside the portal framework.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionBrowseMode
data.value: This page is currently in the browse mode: you can view the final look of the page.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionCatalogMode
data.value: This page is currently in the catalog mode: you can drag existing Web parts between zones or add new parts from the catalog.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionConnectMode
data.value: This page is currently in the connect mode: it allows you to connect Web parts together and exchange information between them.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionDesignMode
data.value: This page is currently in the design mode: it allows you to drag Web parts between zones and edit content inside HTML editors.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionEditMode
data.value: This page is currently in the edit mode: it allows you to edit the properties and attributes of Web parts.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionRevisionMode
data.value: Revision mode is active: all changes will be applied only after you click on the approve button.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionSharedScope
data.value: Shared view active: all changes made to the portal will be visible to ALL users.

data.name: PageTasks_DescriptionUserScope
data.value: User view active: all changes made to the portal will be visible to you only.

data.name: PageTasks_PortalAdministrationText
data.value: Go to the portal administration area

data.name: Default_Ads
data.value: Create banner ads and manage your campaigns here.

data.name: Default_Amazon
data.value: Use Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) - highly scalable, reliable, fast, inexpensive data storage infrastructure - to store portal files.

data.name: Default_Blog
data.value: Create and publish blog posts; assign posts to roles, categories and tags.

data.name: Default_Files
data.value: All file management tools in one place - create, upload, rename and delete files and directories using the familiar Windows Explorer interface.

data.name: Default_Lists
data.value: Manage all list-based information: FAQs, link lists, testimonials, and similar.

data.name: Default_Newsletters
data.value: Create and send newsletters to the target subscriber groups.

data.name: Default_Pages
data.value: This section allows you to manage the portal navigation structure and page properties.

data.name: Default_Polls
data.value: Create and publish polls and user questionnaires.

data.name: Default_Roles
data.value: Manage the unimited number of user roles that can be used to precisely define access privileges to various sections of your portal.

data.name: Default_Users
data.value: Manage all user-related data and assign users to appropriate roles.

data.name: DeleteConfirmation
data.value: This item will be deleted. Are you sure?

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsAdminRoles
data.value: What are Administrator Roles ? - Specifies user roles that have administrator privileges. Members of these roles can administer all aspects of locally installed portals.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsLocalizationFolder
data.value: What is Localization Folder ? - It is virtual localization subfolder that will be prepended before the locale-specific part of the path (example: /language/en-US)

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNewsPublisherRoleName
data.value: What is a news publisher role name ? - Specifies user roles that have news publisher privileges.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXRssAllWebPartsAsOneRssResource
data.value: Present all RSS modules as one RSS channel

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsAdManagerRoles
data.value: Specifies users roles that can manage and publish ads.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsAjaxedWebPartManager
data.value: Set to true (recommended) to set Web part manager Ajax mode (no postbacks when manipulating Web part data and personalization).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsBlogAdministratorRoles
data.value: Specifies users roles that can manage and publish blog posts.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsCustomUserAdminEditPage
data.value: <add key="CustomUserAdminEditPage" value="" /> User attributes are often portal-specific (address, country, etc.) Developers can create customized user admin pages that are used instead of the default user admin edit page and enter the virtual path of such page here.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsDefaultUserRoles
data.value: Specifies a default user roles inside the portals.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsEditorToolbarMode
data.value: HTML editor toolbar mode. This key can hold the following values: PageTop, ShowOnFocus, Default, Floating.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsGoogleAnalyticsAccountNo
data.value: Used to hold Google analytics account number. If set, Google analytics tracking code is added to all pages.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsHideFoldersThatBeginWith
data.value: Lists folder name prefixes that are not displayed in the file management and other related sections.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsLogAdminActions
data.value: When set to true the portal logs all user actions for debugging purposes.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsLogFailedLoginAttempts
data.value: When set to true the portal logs all failed login attempts for security and debugging purposes.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsLogUserLogins
data.value: When set to true the portal logs all user login attempts for debugging purposes.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsModuleGalleryPath
data.value: Virtual path of the module gallery folder. All Web parts are loaded from this path.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXCacheFolder
data.value: Virtual path to the location used to hold serialized cache data.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXMaxDocumentSize
data.value: Maximum document size to upload in HTML editors (in bytes).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXMaxFlashSize
data.value: Maximum Macromedia Flash file size to upload in HTML editors (in bytes).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXMaxImageSize
data.value: Maximum image size to upload in HTML editors (in bytes).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXMaxMediaSize
data.value: Maximum media file size (avi and similar) to upload in HTML editors (in bytes).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXMaxTemplateSize
data.value: Maximum template size to upload in HTML editors (in bytes).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXRssAllWebPartsAsOneRssResource
data.value: Set to true if all parts from a single page should generate a common RSS channel.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXRssIsTurnedOn
data.value: Set to true to enable automatic RSS data generation.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMonoXUploadPath
data.value: Virtual path to the location where uploaded documents and other media files (images, Flash) are held.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNavigationExtensions
data.value: Lists navigation extensions so the portal could recognize content files. This type of files are tracked in the portal database.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNewsEditorRoles
data.value: Specifies user roles that can edit news.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNewsKeyWordsSplitters
data.value: Lists keyword splitter characters for the news modules.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNewsWorkingMode
data.value: When set to advanced mode, all news articles has to be approved by the publishers before they can appear live. In simple mode all news articles are published immediatelly. (Possible values: SimpleMode, AdvancedMode)

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsNumberOfBackupItems
data.value: Set the number of document backups held in the database (every change is saved to the database).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsPersonalizationRoles
data.value: Specifies user roles that are able to personalize locally installed portals.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsRewritePageTitles
data.value: Page title can be hardcoded (in the ASPX file), or set dynamically via administrative panel - page management section. When this key is set to true the hardcoded values are overwritten by dynamically assigned page titles.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsSaveDocumentBackups
data.value: Set to true to save backups of all documents held by HTML editors (every change is saved to the database).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowAjaxPanelForRoles
data.value: Specifies user roles that are able to use admin-level Ajax functionality.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowChromeForNonAdmins
data.value: Set to true if all Web parts should show their chrome even to non-admin users.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsSqlServerDQECompatibilityLevel
data.value: Used by LLBLGen Object Relational Mapper, defines the version of SQL Server used by the portal engine. The value "2" is used for SQL Server 2005.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsUploadAllowedFileExtensions
data.value: Lists file extensions that are considered safe and allowed for upload.

data.name: PortalSettings_ShowChromeForNonAdmins
data.value: Show web part chrome for non-administrator users

data.name: PortalSettings_AutogenerateMetaKeywords
data.value: Turn on Portal automatic Meta keywords generation

data.name: PortalSettings_EnableContentSharingFor
data.value: Enable content sharing for following modules

data.name: PortalSettings_LocalizationConnectionStringKey
data.value: Connection string key used for DB localization provider

data.name: PortalSettings_MaximumNumberOfKeywords
data.value: Maximum number of Meta keywords to generate

data.name: PortalSettings_MaximumNumberOfThreads
data.value: Maximum number of threads for multithreaded processes

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsAllowCloseWerb
data.value: Set to true if the close verb should be available for all Web parts.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsApplicationTitle
data.value: Portal title used for user friendly email titles, signatures, etc. If left empty, host name is used by default

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsAutogenerateMetaKeywords
data.value: Set to true if the portal engine should auto-generate META keyword tags for all pages.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsBlogDisplayUrl
data.value: Raw, non-rewritten URL of the page that displays blog posts for LiveWriter and similar MetaWeblog-based editing tools

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsConvertVideoToFlv
data.value: Indicates if all files are automatically converted to FLV format

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsCustomAdminTasksControl
data.value: Location of the custom task control that can be added to the main administrative screen.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsEnableContentSharingFor
data.value: Used with a "Tell a friend" control. Available built-in modules that use it: News,Blog,Page,PhotoGallery

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsGravatarType
data.value: Gravatar types: identicon, monsterid, wavatar or url to custom icon.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsjQueryReferencePath
data.value: jQuery reference path. Change it to use other jQuery versions.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsLocalizationConnectionStringKey
data.value: Database connection string for DB localization provider.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMailFromAddress
data.value: Mail address used to send various confirmation mail messages from the portal

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMaximumNumberOfKeywords
data.value: Maximum number of META keywords to generate.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMaximumNumberOfThreads
data.value: Maximum number of threads for multithreaded processes (sending newsletter and similar).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMaxSiteMapItems
data.value: Maximum nuber of items to put in a single SiteMap "file"

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsPageTitlePrefix
data.value: Page title prefix that is to be displayed on each portal page.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsPageTitleSuffix
data.value: Page title suffix that is to be displayed on each portal page.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsPingServices
data.value: List of comma-separated blog ping services.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowBlogCategories
data.value: Set to true if blog categories are used.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowBlogGravatars
data.value: Set to true if gravatars are used in blog comments.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowBlogRoles
data.value: Set to true if blog roles are used.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowCatalogIconImages
data.value: Indicates if Catalog icon images are shown for Web parts. Appropriate icons has to be present in the ~/App_Themes/Common/img/CatalogIconImages

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowHtmlEditorsInDesignModeOnly
data.value: Set to true if HTML editors should be shown only in the design mode (to achieve full WYSIWYG effect for administrators). If set to false HTML editors are always active.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsShowWebPartZoneTitles
data.value: Set to true if the Web part zone titles are to be shown on the page.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsSocialNetworkingMode
data.value: Social networking working mode. Possible values: None, Friend, Group (In group-based modes everything is based on the group membership and user can communicate with and pick friends from the groups he is a member of. All group members can be messaged individually. In friend based - default, Facebook-style - mode user can pick friends from all members, and can communicate only with friends from his list or members from the groups he joined (but cannot see individual group members when he sends messages))

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsSocialNetworkingRelationshipMode
data.value: For example, User A adds User B to his friend list. With a one-way friendship framework, User B is User A's friend, but User A is not User B's friend. With a two-way friendship framework, User B is User A's friend and User A is User B's friend. Possible values: None, OneWay, TwoWay

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsStopWords
data.value: List of "stopwords" for keyword generator (these common words are NOT included in the keyword list).

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsStoreThumbnails
data.value: Indicates if thumbnails are automatically created and saved for all uploaded files; they are alternatively created on the fly on each request

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsThumbnailSize
data.value: Thumbnail size: Small (72px), Medium (144 px), Large (288 px)

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsTmpUploadPath
data.value: Temporary upload path, used as an intermediary storage for transferring uploaded files to Amazon S3 and similar services

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsVideoConverterExeLocation
data.value: Holds a physical path to the video converter executable

data.name: PortalSettings_ShowCatalogIconImages
data.value: Show wep part catalog icon images

data.name: PortalSettings_ShowHtmlEditorsInDesignModeOnly
data.value: Show HTML document editor in Portal designe mode only

data.name: PortalSettings_EnableValidatorsAdapter
data.value: Enable pretty validators adapter MonoX wide

data.name: PortalSettings_MessagePageUrl
data.value: Url to a Web page for message show functionality

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsEnableValidatorsAdapter
data.value: Enables pretty validators MonoX wide. Note: To correctly implement pretty validator adapter on the custom project you need to add a "ValidatorAdapter" css class to validator or your custom css class.

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsMessagePageUrl
data.value: Web page url used to show messages within the MonoX CMS

data.name: PageAdmin_Grid_RowToolTip
data.value: Double click to open '{0}' page in a new window.

data.name: PageManagerWrongThemeAndMaster
data.value: The master page and/or theme you entered are not compatible with the selected page.

data.name: PortalSettings_ClientCacheMaxAge
data.value: How long (in days) to keep the content cached in the client's browser

data.name: PortalSettings_EnablePageOutputCacheInAdminMode
data.value: Enable page output cache in admin mode

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsClientCacheMaxAge
data.value: How long (in days) to keep the content cached in the client's browser. Used by GetImage handler and related parts, cache for standard static content types should also be set in system.webServer section (IIS 7)

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsEnablePageOutputCacheInAdminMode
data.value: Indicates if page output cache is enabled in admin mode. Disable to avoid any side effects

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsEnableSmtpSSL
data.value: Enable SSL while sending an e-mail portal wide

data.name: PortalSettings_MonoXSettingsDiscussionAdministratorRoles
data.value: Specifies users roles that can manage discussion board.
